2 Kings or 4 Kings__12.4__Sanctified: : That is, dedicated to God's service.-- Ibid.
2 Kings or 4 Kings__12.4__The price of a soul: : That is, the ordinary oblation, which every soul was to offer by the law. Ex. 30.
2 Kings or 4 Kings__12.21__The city of David: : He was buried in the same city with his fathers, but not in the sepulchres of the kings. 2 Par. 14.
